summary: This is an email from 4chan LEO Support to an unspecified recipient, responding to a subpoena (Case ID: 2019R01059) dated August 14, 2019. It attaches requested records and inquires about certification requirements due to the custodian of records not being a US citizen.

events.title: Subpoena Issuance and Response
events.description: A subpoena (Case ID: 2019R01059) was issued, and 4chan LEO Support responded by providing the requested records and asking about certification requirements.

keyFacts: A subpoena (Case ID: 2019R01059) was issued on August 14, 2019, requesting records from 4chan.
4chan LEO Support provided the requested records in a file named '4chan Report 2093 (Case ID: 2019R01059).txt'.
The Custodian of Records for 4chan Community Support LLC is not a US citizen, prompting an inquiry about alternative certification forms or a waiver of the declaration requirement.
